snippet.title: Word Factori - Official Release Date Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Word Factori will be available on Steam on August 3, 2023. Watch the charming trailer for this word-building game where your only resource is the letter "i". Build a chain of factories to bend, rotate, reflect, and merge "i" into more complex letters. Discover secret letter recipes, unlock hidden word art, and optimize your factory chains for high scores.

#GameTrailers #SummerOfGaming
